name: Royal Comfort 3-Seater
description: Experience luxury with this premium 3-seater sofa featuring plush cushions, durable fabric upholstery, and a sturdy wooden frame. Perfect for your living room.

name: Urban Fabric Sofa
description: Modern urban design with comfortable fabric upholstery. Features removable cushion covers for easy cleaning and maintenance.

name: Luxury L-Shape Sofa
description: Spacious L-shaped sofa with premium upholstery and ergonomic design. Ideal for large living spaces and family gatherings.

name: King Size Wooden Bed
description: Elegant king-size bed crafted from premium solid wood. Features a classic headboard design and robust construction for lasting durability.

name: Hydraulic Storage Bed
description: Smart storage solution with hydraulic lift mechanism. Maximize bedroom space with ample storage underneath. Premium quality mattress support.

name: Metal Frame Bed
description: Contemporary metal frame bed with a minimalist design. Strong and durable construction with a sleek powder-coated finish.

name: 4-Seater Dining Set
description: Complete dining set with table and 4 chairs. Compact design perfect for small families. Easy to clean and maintain.

name: 6-Seater Solid Wood Set
description: Premium solid wood dining set for 6 people. Timeless design with comfortable cushioned chairs. Perfect for family dinners and gatherings.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Comfortable ergonomic office chair with lumbar support, adjustable height, and breathable mesh back. Ideal for long working hours.

name: Work Desk with Drawer
description: Spacious work desk with built-in drawers for storage. Sturdy construction with a smooth finish. Perfect for home office setup.

name: 3-Door Wardrobe
description: Spacious 3-door wardrobe with multiple shelves and hanging space. Modern design with durable engineered wood construction.

name: Sliding Wardrobe
description: Premium sliding wardrobe with mirror finish. Space-saving design with smooth glide mechanism. Ample storage for all your clothing needs.

name: Wall Mounted Unit
description: Modern wall-mounted TV unit with cable management. Sleek floating design that saves floor space. Suitable for TVs up to 55 inches.

name: Wooden TV Cabinet
description: Classic wooden TV cabinet with storage drawers and open shelves. Premium finish with sturdy construction. Supports large TVs.
